short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shows original titles of HN stories.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
HNtitles "unmoderates" titles of Hacker News stories: it shows the title as it was before being moderated (changed). Two reasons:
- sometimes, because the title changed since the first time we saw a story, we click on the same story twice, and this is annoying (yes, in theory the link should be shown as visited, but not on a different device, etc.)
- while moderation usually adds information and reduces clickbait, it sometimes also destroys information; it's nice to be able to read the title as the original poster intended.
